title: Thief of Thieves, Vol. 2, "Help Me"
description: Conrad Paulson lives a secret double life as master thief Redmond. There is nothing he can't steal, nothing he can't have... except for the life he left behind. But when his big heist doesn't go as planned, the aftermath shows that every action has an equal - and equally violent - reaction. Collects Thief of Thieves #8-13.
author: Robert Kirkman
